task.title: Example: Request token for Authorization Code grant type

context.p: For the Authorization Code grant type, the workflow is different.

step.cmd: Open your web service request object.
Switch to the Authorization tab, choose the Type as OAuth 2.0 and Grant Type as Authorization Code.
You need to enter these values: Callback URL, Auth URL, Access Token URL, Consumer Key, and Consumer Secret.
Then, click on Request token. A dialog appears:
Copy the generated URL in the dialog and paste it into the address bar of your browser. You will be directed to the authorization page, where you need to grant access to the inquired resource.
Copy the result return from the address bar of your browser, then paste it back into the dialog.

info.p: For a more detailed example, you can refer to Imgur API documentation: Authorization and OAuth.
